pageContent: Background: Qualitative research on cancer patients' survivor-identity and lived experiences in low- and middle-income countries is scarce. Our study aimed at exploring the concept and experience of survivorship for Mexicans living with breast, cervical, and prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
National trends in prostate cancer screening among older American men with limited 9-year life expectancies: evidence of an increased need for shared decision making
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24523016/
